actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Family and Human Services.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, GAO.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Family and Human Services

official_title: A bill to establish a grant program to provide for a centralized system of child care information and referral.
short_title: Child Care Information and Referral Services Act
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Child Care Information and Referral Services Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Commissioner of the Administration for Children, Youth, and Families, to establish a grant program to assist public or private nonprofit organizations in the establishment or operation of community-based child care information and referral centers. Sets forth grant application requirements. Limits the duration and amount of grants to a center. Sets reporting requirements for centers receiving such grants. Directs the Secretary to report annually to specified congressional committees on activities under this Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Child Care Information and Referral Services Act
A bill to establish a grant program to provide for a centralized system of child care information and referral.
